subPois.name: Morning Rituals
subPois.description:
Wake up reluctantly.
Coffee first — existential questions later.
Window stare: 3–5 mins of deep thinking (or daydreaming).

subPois.description:
• Series > Movies
• Podcast > Music
• Reading > Audiobook
• Warm and cozy (inside) > Hot and sweaty (outside)

subPois.name: Breakfast of Champions
subPois.description:
The perfect ratio:
• 1 Part Future Life (50g)
• 1 Part Whey Protein (50g)
• 3 Parts Milk (150ml)

Macros:
Protein: 53g
Carbs: 34g
Fats: 14g

Cals: 474cals
